doc.summary: Gets a registry from the registry set.
doc.text: Gets a registry from the registry set.

doc.summary: Gets a writable registry from the registry set.
doc.text:
Gets a writable registry from the registry set. This only succeeds, if the registry is a datapack registry and this method is called in the correct stage.
The registries returned by this method can create intrusive holders.

doc.summary: Gets a <ref cls="net/minecraft/core/RegistryAccess">RegistryAccess</ref> for this registry set.
doc.text: Gets a <ref cls="net/minecraft/core/RegistryAccess">RegistryAccess</ref> for this registry set. This can only be used during the  <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/datagen/DatagenStage" field="DATAGEN">datagen stage</ref>.

doc.summary: Gets the target registry for holders created from registries returned by <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/datagen/RegistrySet" method="writableRegistry" type="<T>(net.minecraft.resources.ResourceKey<? extends net.minecraft.core.Registry<T>>)net.minecraft.core.WritableRegistry<T>">#writableRegistry(ResourceKey)</ref>.
doc.text: Gets the target registry for holders created from registries returned by #writableRegistry(ResourceKey). If a holder is unknown to the system, returns null.
